brief.content-text:
Four Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image
The diagram depicts three rectangular boxes stacked on top of one another. The bottom box (or foundation) represents Internetwork Layer Protocol. The middle box represents Transport Layer Protocols, and the top box represents Application Layer Protocols. Inside the bottom box is IP, inside the middle box is TCP and UDP, and inside the top box is HTTP, FTP, DNS, SMTP, TELNET, and DHCP.
